message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a valuable asset. I'm willing to sell it to you for $10,000.
I appreciate your offer, but I'm looking to save as much as I can. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell the product to you for $9,500. It's a great compromise, and I think you'll really benefit from having this product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still looking to save some more. I'm willing to pay $9,200 for the product. Can you consider this price?

I understand you're still looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $9,400. It's getting close to my minimum price, but I'm willing to compromise to get the deal done.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $9,000 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $9,300. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still looking to save a bit more. I'm willing to pay $8,800 for the product. Can you consider this price?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I've already compromised significantly. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9,000, but that's as low as I can go.
